snippet: With 47 games to go in a Mets season that has come undone, R. A. Dickey is one good reason to keep following the team. The pitcher is on a pace to finish 21-4 with 234 strikeouts.
abstract: Keeping Score; New York Mets pitcher R A Dickey, with a 15-3 record, has a decent chance to win 20 games, and is a legitimate candidate for the National League Cy Young award; he also has a chance to lead the National League in strikeouts, something more commonly associated with someone who throws overpowering fastballs rather than much slower knuckle-balls.
lead_paragraph: With 47 games to go in a Mets season that has come undone, R. A. Dickey is one good reason to keep following the team. The pitcher is on a pace to finish 21-4 with 234 strikeouts.

headline.seo: R. A. Dickey Is One Reason to Keep Following Mets
